snippet: Weighing all the options and the complicated dynamics at play in Iraq and Syria.
abstract: Thomas L Friedman Op-Ed column cautions that America should stay out of fight to push back Sunni militias aligned with Islamic State in Iraq and Syria; contends unified Syria and unified Iraq are no longer possible unless international generational project is undertaken; suggests strengthening other areas in the region.
lead_paragraph: Weighing all the options and the complicated dynamics at play in Iraq and Syria.

headline.seo: The Conundrum of a Unified Iraq and a Unified Syria
headline.main: What to Do With the Twins?
headline.print_headline: What to Do With the Twins?
